member.name: T:Gios.Word.WordArea
member.summary: the abstract class of an area of the document. Could be a Table Cell or the Document itself.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.SetFont(System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Sets the Font for the next writing.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.SetForegroundColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the color for the next writing.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.SetFontBackgroundColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the color for the next writing.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.SetFontBackgroundColor
member.summary: Resets the font background color

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.WriteControlWord(System.String)
member.summary:
Expert users only. Insert a control word into the Document. (see RTF specifcations)
For example: myDocument.WriteControlWord("animtext3"); Starts sparkling text writing.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.WriteRtf(System.String)
member.summary: Expert users only. Writes RTF code directly into the Document. This can be useful for implementing further RTF capabilities.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a text line.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.WriteTabSpace
member.summary: Writes a TAB (Tabulation) Space

member.summary: Sets the line Indent

member.summary: Sets the line Indent

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.SetParagraph
member.summary: Resets the line indent

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.WriteLine
member.summary: Writes a new line.

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string

member.name: M:Gios.Word.WordArea.PutImage(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Puts a jpeg image into the current position.

member.summary: Sets the horizontal alignment of the text.

member.summary: sets the Relative Width of the Column. For example: if the relative widths of a 3 columns table are 10,10,30; the columns will respectivelly sized as 20%,20%,60% of the table size.
